item.title: New module: devel/arrow version 19.0.1
item.description: Apache Arrow is a universal columnar format and multi-language toolbox for fast data interchange and in-memory analytics.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/elbencho version 3.0.25
item.description: A distributed storage benchmark for file systems, object stores & block devices with support for GPUs
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/stata version 19
item.description: Stata is a complete, integrated statistical software package that provides everything you need for data analysis, data management, and graphics.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/py-globus-cli version 3.33.1_py312
item.description: A command line wrapper over the Globus SDK for Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/kalign version 3.4.0
item.description: A fast multiple sequence alignment program.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/py-chai-lab version 0.6.1_py312
item.description: Chai-1, SOTA model for biomolecular structure prediction
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/py-mpi4py version 4.0.3_py312
item.description: MPI for Python provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/2/3 specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++ bindings.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: viz/py-open3d version 0.19.0_py312
item.description: Python bindings for Open3D
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: viz/open3d version 0.19.0
item.description: A modern library for 3D data processing
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: chemistry/nwchem version 7.2.3
item.description: NWChem is an ab initio computational chemistry software package which also includes quantum chemical and molecular dynamics functionality.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: physics/postgis version 3.5.3
item.description: PostGIS extends the capabilities of the PostgreSQL relational database by adding support for storing, indexing, and querying geospatial data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/mpifileutils version 0.12
item.description: mpiFileUtils is a suite of MPI-based tools to manage large datasets, which may vary from large directory trees to large files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/libarchive version 3.7.9
item.description: The libarchive project develops a portable, efficient C library that can read and write streaming archives in a variety of formats.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/lwgrp version 1.0.6
item.description: The Light-weight Group Library provides methods for MPI codes to quickly create and destroy process groups.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/dtcmp version 1.1.5
item.description: Datatype Compare (DTCMP) Library for sorting and ranking distributed data using MPI.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/xan version 0.48.0
item.description: xan is a command line tool that can be used to process CSV files directly from the shell.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: chemistry/gromacs version 2025.1
item.description: GROMACS is a versatile package to perform molecular dynamics, i.e. simulate the Newtonian equations of motion for systems with hundreds to millions of particles.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-xgboost version 3.0.0_py312
item.description: Python bindings for xgboost
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/xgboost version 3.0.0
item.description: XGBoost is an optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed to be highly efficient, flexible and portable.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/grpc version 1.17.0
item.description: gRPC is a modern, open source, high-performance remote procedure call (RPC) framework that can run anywhere.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/cellsnp-lite version 1.2.3
item.description: Cellsnp-lite is a C/C++ tool for efficient genotyping bi-allelic SNPs on single cells.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: chemistry/vasp version 6.5.1
item.description: The Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP) is a computer program for atomic scale materials modelling, e.g. electronic structure calculations and quantum-mechanical molecular dynamics, from first principles.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/nvhpc version 25.1
item.description: NVIDIA HPC Software Development Kit (SDK) including C, C++, and Fortran compilers.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/gdal version 3.10.2
item.description: GDAL is a translator library for raster and vector geospatial data formats.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/json-c version 0.18
item.description: JSON-C implements a reference counting object model that allows you to easily construct JSON objects in C, output them as JSON formatted strings and parse JSON formatted strings back into the C representation of JSON objects.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/qhull version 2020.2
item.description: Qhull computes the convex hull, Delaunay triangulation, Voronoi diagram, halfspace intersection about a point, furthest-site Delaunay triangulation, and furthest-site Voronoi diagram.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/julia version 1.11.4
item.description: Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for numerical computing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/geos version 3.13.1
item.description: GEOS is a C/C++ library for computational geometry with a focus on algorithms used in geographic information systems (GIS) software.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/proj version 9.5.1
item.description: PROJ is a generic coordinate transformation software that transforms geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to another.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/imagemagick version 7.1.1-43
item.description: ImageMagick is a free and open-source software suite for displaying, converting, and editing raster image and vector image files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/portaudio version 19.7.0
item.description: PortAudio is a free, cross-platform, open-source, audio I/O library.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/wget version 1.25.0
item.description: GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS, FTP and FTPS, the most widely used Internet protocols.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libmetalink version 0.1.3
item.description: Libmetalink is a library to read Metalink XML download description format.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libidn version 2.3.7
item.description: GNU Libidn is a fully documented implementation of the Stringprep, Punycode and IDNA 2003 specifications.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-pynvjitlink version 0.5.0_py312
item.description: Python bindings for the nvJitLink library
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.description: Python bindings for LIghtGBM
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/lightgbm version 4.5.0
item.description: LightGBM is a gradient boosting framework that uses tree based learning algorithms
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/R version 4.4.2
item.description: R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.

item.title: New module: math/py-vllm version 0.7.0_py312
item.description: vLLM is a fast and easy-to-use library for LLM inference and serving.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/py-crested version 1.2.1_py312
item.description: CREsted (Cis-Regulatory Element Sequence Training, Explanation, and Design) is an easy-to-use deep learning package for training enhancer models on single-cell ATAC sequencing (scATAC-seq) data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-xgrammar version 0.1.8_py312
item.description: XGrammar is open-source solution for flexible, portable, and fast structured generations, aiming at bring flexible zero-overhead structure generation everywhere.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/ollama version 0.5.7
item.description: Ollama is a free, open-source platform that allows users to run large language models (LLMs) locally.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-rapids version 24.04_py39
item.description: NVIDIA RAPIDS is an open-source suite of GPU-accelerated data science and AI libraries with APIs that match the most popular open-source data tools.

item.description: Nextflow is a bioinformatics workflow manager that enables the development of portable and reproducible workflows.
